CustomField.defaultValue: IF( AND(Month(TODAY())=2,Day(TODAY())=29), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()) + 1, Month(TODAY()),Day(TODAY())-1), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()) + 1, Month(TODAY()),Day(TODAY())))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This date reflects the estimated close date of the deal (updated by the deal team)
CustomField.label: BFIN Estimated Close Date
